title: Cergy Velo2 (bikes)
description: Cergy Velo2 is a tool allowing you to view the status of bike stations Velo2 networks, of Cergy-Pontoise and suburbs. Through the map, view closest stations to your location, follow the number of bikes and the numbers of available slots. Find a station easily with adress or name.You can add favorite and use the dedicated widget, or check on your Android Wear watch ! Feel free to send me your suggestions or problems, thanks to the dedicated tab in the app.
descriptionHTML:
Cergy Velo2 is a tool allowing you to view the status of bike stations Velo2 networks, of Cergy-Pontoise and suburbs.

Through the map, view closest stations to your location, follow the number of bikes and the numbers of available slots.

Find a station easily with adress or name.

You can add favorite and use the dedicated widget, or check on your Android Wear watch !

Feel free to send me your suggestions or problems, thanks to the dedicated tab in the app.
